summary.heading:
Security
Automation Certifications
summary.description: Verify your security and networking automation expertise with our Vault and Consul certifications. Earn an associate-level certification to validate your foundational Vault or Consul knowledge and skills. You can also demonstrate your advanced Vault operational experience when you pass the Vault Operations Professional exam.

hero.heading:
Security
Automation Certifications
hero.description: Verify your security and networking automation expertise with our Vault and Consul certifications. Earn an associate-level certification to validate your foundational Vault or Consul knowledge and skills. You can also demonstrate your advanced Vault operational experience when you pass the Vault Operations Professional exam.

exams.title: Vault Associate
exams.description: Demonstrate your foundational Vault knowledge and skills in an hour-long multiple-choice exam.

exams.title: Vault Operations Professional
exams.description: Prove your advanced, production-level Vault operational expertise in an intensive, lab-based exam.

exams.title: Consul Associate
exams.description: Demonstrate your foundational Consul knowledge and skills in an hour-long multiple-choice exam.
